title: What two-way radio has the longest range? - Quora

response.answer_text: The one that communicates through a repeater. And the one that is on high frequency, sometimes called short wave. Another is one that communicates using the internet. Your question need clarification. What communication do you desire? Is it with a hand held radio? Can it be a stationary base station? Lots of time it depends on your antenna system. You can have a great radio but a terrible antenna. Are you wondering about cheap walkie talkies like from Walmart?
The ones NASA uses to communicate with the Voyager spacecraft are currently achieving about 12.5 billion miles.
